overview: Convention Girls is an adult romp set at a beach-side convention of the fictitious American Association of Doll Manufacturers. This Florida-made exploitation movie contains enough frank, realistic, at times mean-spirited dialogue and adult situations to make one think of the films of the great director Robert Altman (or John Cassavetes).
tagline: Convention Girls Know How To Take Care Of A Man...In The Most Unconventional Ways.
title: Convention Girls
